text: Donnie Yen (born 27 July 1963), also known as Yen Ji-dan (甄子丹), is a Chinese- born Hong Kong actor, martial artist, movie director, producer and action choreographer. He is also a wushu world champion many times. He is best known for his role as Ip Man in the Ip Man (2008-2015) trilogy movies. He also appeared in Shanghai Knights (2003), Flash Point (2007) and Rogue One (2016). Yen was born in Guangzhou, Guangdong. When he was two years old, his family moved to Hong Kong. They later moved to Boston, Massachusetts, United States when he was 11. He has been married twice and has three children. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Hong Kong actors Category:Chinese movie directors Category:Choreographers Category:Judoka Category:American mixed martial artists Category:Chinese movie actors Category:Chinese movie producers Category:Chinese television actors
title: Donnie Yen
